00021 /*
00022  * This file contains a C and MMX implementation of the Scale2x effect.
00023  *
00024  * You can find an high level description of the effect at :
00025  *
00026  * http://scale2x.sourceforge.net/
00027  *
00028  * Alternatively at the previous license terms, you are allowed to use this
00029  * code in your program with these conditions:
00030  * - the program is not used in commercial activities.
00031  * - the whole source code of the program is released with the binary.
00032  * - derivative works of the program are allowed.
00033  */
00034 
00035 #if HAVE_CONFIG_H
00036 #include <config.h>
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #include "scale2x.h"
00040 
00041 #include <assert.h>
00042 
00043 /***************************************************************************/
00044 /* Scale2x C implementation */
00045 
00046 /**
00047  * Define the macro USE_SCALE_RANDOMWRITE to enable
00048  * an optimized version which writes memory in random order.
00049  * This version is a little faster if you write in system memory.
00050  * But it's a lot slower if you write in video memory.
00051  * So, enable it only if you are sure to never write directly in video memory.
00052  */
00053 #define USE_SCALE_RANDOMWRITE
00054 
00055 static inline void scale2x_8_def_whole(scale2x_uint8* restrict dst0, scale2x_uint8* restrict dst1, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00056 {
00057  assert(count >= 2);
00058  
00059  /* first pixel */
00060  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00061   dst0[0] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00062   dst0[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00063   dst1[0] = src1[0] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00064   dst1[1] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00065  } else {
00066   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00067   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00068   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00069   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00070  }
00071  ++src0;
00072  ++src1;
00073  ++src2;
00074  dst0 += 2;
00075  dst1 += 2;
00076  
00077  /* central pixels */
00078  count -= 2;
00079  while (count) {
00080   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00081    dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00082    dst0[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00083    dst1[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00084    dst1[1] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00085   } else {
00086    dst0[0] = src1[0];
00087    dst0[1] = src1[0];
00088    dst1[0] = src1[0];
00089    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00090   }
00091   
00092   ++src0;
00093   ++src1;
00094   ++src2;
00095   dst0 += 2;
00096   dst1 += 2;
00097   --count;
00098  }
00099  
00100  /* last pixel */
00101  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00102   dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00103   dst0[1] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00104   dst1[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00105   dst1[1] = src1[0] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00106  } else {
00107   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00108   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00109   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00110   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00111  }
00112 }
00113 
00114 static inline void scale2x_8_def_border(scale2x_uint8* restrict dst, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00115 {
00116  assert(count >= 2);
00117  
00118  /* first pixel */
00119  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00120   dst[0] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00121   dst[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00122  } else {
00123   dst[0] = src1[0];
00124   dst[1] = src1[0];
00125  }
00126  ++src0;
00127  ++src1;
00128  ++src2;
00129  dst += 2;
00130  
00131  /* central pixels */
00132  count -= 2;
00133  while (count) {
00134   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00135    dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00136    dst[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00137   } else {
00138    dst[0] = src1[0];
00139    dst[1] = src1[0];
00140   }
00141   
00142   ++src0;
00143   ++src1;
00144   ++src2;
00145   dst += 2;
00146   --count;
00147  }
00148  
00149  /* last pixel */
00150  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00151   dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00152   dst[1] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00153  } else {
00154   dst[0] = src1[0];
00155   dst[1] = src1[0];
00156  }
00157 }

00159 static inline void scale2x_8_def_center(scale2x_uint8* restrict dst, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint8* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00160 {
00161  assert(count >= 2);
00162  
00163  /* first pixel */
00164  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00165   dst[0] = src1[0];
00166   dst[1] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00167  } else {
00168   dst[0] = src1[0];
00169   dst[1] = src1[0];
00170  }
00171  ++src0;
00172  ++src1;
00173  ++src2;
00174  dst += 2;
00175  
00176  /* central pixels */
00177  count -= 2;
00178  while (count) {
00179   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00180    dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00181    dst[1] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00182   } else {
00183    dst[0] = src1[0];
00184    dst[1] = src1[0];
00185   }
00186   
00187   ++src0;
00188   ++src1;
00189   ++src2;
00190   dst += 2;
00191   --count;
00192  }
00193  
00194  /* last pixel */
00195  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00196   dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00197   dst[1] = src1[0];
00198  } else {
00199   dst[0] = src1[0];
00200   dst[1] = src1[0];
00201  }
00202 }

00204 static inline void scale2x_16_def_whole(scale2x_uint16* restrict dst0, scale2x_uint16* restrict dst1, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00205 {
00206  assert(count >= 2);
00207  
00208  /* first pixel */
00209  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00210   dst0[0] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00211   dst0[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00212   dst1[0] = src1[0] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00213   dst1[1] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00214  } else {
00215   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00216   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00217   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00218   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00219  }
00220  ++src0;
00221  ++src1;
00222  ++src2;
00223  dst0 += 2;
00224  dst1 += 2;
00225  
00226  /* central pixels */
00227  count -= 2;
00228  while (count) {
00229   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00230    dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00231    dst0[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00232    dst1[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00233    dst1[1] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00234   } else {
00235    dst0[0] = src1[0];
00236    dst0[1] = src1[0];
00237    dst1[0] = src1[0];
00238    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00239   }
00240   
00241   ++src0;
00242   ++src1;
00243   ++src2;
00244   dst0 += 2;
00245   dst1 += 2;
00246   --count;
00247  }
00248  
00249  /* last pixel */
00250  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00251   dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00252   dst0[1] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00253   dst1[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00254   dst1[1] = src1[0] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00255  } else {
00256   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00257   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00258   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00259   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00260  }
00261 }

00263 static inline void scale2x_16_def_border(scale2x_uint16* restrict dst, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00264 {
00265  assert(count >= 2);
00266  
00267  /* first pixel */
00268  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00269   dst[0] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00270   dst[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00271  } else {
00272   dst[0] = src1[0];
00273   dst[1] = src1[0];
00274  }
00275  ++src0;
00276  ++src1;
00277  ++src2;
00278  dst += 2;
00279  
00280  /* central pixels */
00281  count -= 2;
00282  while (count) {
00283   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00284    dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00285    dst[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00286   } else {
00287    dst[0] = src1[0];
00288    dst[1] = src1[0];
00289   }
00290   
00291   ++src0;
00292   ++src1;
00293   ++src2;
00294   dst += 2;
00295   --count;
00296  }
00297  
00298  /* last pixel */
00299  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00300   dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00301   dst[1] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00302  } else {
00303   dst[0] = src1[0];

00308 static inline void scale2x_16_def_center(scale2x_uint16* restrict dst, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint16* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00309 {
00310  assert(count >= 2);
00311  
00312  /* first pixel */
00313  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00314   dst[0] = src1[0];
00315   dst[1] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00316  } else {
00317   dst[0] = src1[0];
00318   dst[1] = src1[0];
00319  }
00320  ++src0;
00321  ++src1;
00322  ++src2;
00323  dst += 2;
00324  
00325  /* central pixels */
00326  count -= 2;
00327  while (count) {
00328   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00329    dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00330    dst[1] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00331   } else {
00332    dst[0] = src1[0];
00333    dst[1] = src1[0];
00334   }
00335   
00336   ++src0;
00337   ++src1;
00338   ++src2;
00339   dst += 2;
00340   --count;
00341  }
00342  
00343  /* last pixel */
00344  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00345   dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00346   dst[1] = src1[0];
00347  } else {
00348   dst[0] = src1[0];
00349   dst[1] = src1[0];
00350  }
00351 }

00353 static inline void scale2x_32_def_whole(scale2x_uint32* restrict dst0, scale2x_uint32* restrict dst1, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00354 {
00355  assert(count >= 2);
00356  
00357  /* first pixel */
00358  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00359   dst0[0] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00360   dst0[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00361   dst1[0] = src1[0] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00362   dst1[1] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00363  } else {
00364   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00365   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00366   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00367   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00368  }
00369  ++src0;
00370  ++src1;
00371  ++src2;
00372  dst0 += 2;
00373  dst1 += 2;
00374  
00375  /* central pixels */
00376  count -= 2;
00377  while (count) {
00378   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00379    dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00380    dst0[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00381    dst1[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00382    dst1[1] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00383   } else {
00384    dst0[0] = src1[0];
00385    dst0[1] = src1[0];
00386    dst1[0] = src1[0];
00387    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00388   }
00389   
00390   ++src0;
00391   ++src1;
00392   ++src2;
00393   dst0 += 2;
00394   dst1 += 2;
00395   --count;
00396  }
00397  
00398  /* last pixel */
00399  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00400   dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00401   dst0[1] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00402   dst1[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00403   dst1[1] = src1[0] == src2[0] ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00404  } else {
00405   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00406   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00407   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00408   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00409  }
00410 }

00412 static inline void scale2x_32_def_border(scale2x_uint32* restrict dst, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00413 {
00414  assert(count >= 2);
00415  
00416  /* first pixel */
00417  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00418   dst[0] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00419   dst[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00420  } else {
00421   dst[0] = src1[0];
00422   dst[1] = src1[0];
00423  }
00424  ++src0;
00425  ++src1;
00426  ++src2;
00427  dst += 2;
00428  
00429  /* central pixels */
00430  count -= 2;
00431  while (count) {
00432   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00433    dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00434    dst[1] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00435   } else {
00436    dst[0] = src1[0];
00437    dst[1] = src1[0];
00438   }
00439   
00440   ++src0;
00441   ++src1;
00442   ++src2;
00443   dst += 2;
00444   --count;
00445  }
00446  
00447  /* last pixel */
00448  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00449   dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00450   dst[1] = src1[0] == src0[0] ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00451  } else {
00452   dst[0] = src1[0];
00453   dst[1] = src1[0];
00454  }
00455 }

00457 static inline void scale2x_32_def_center(scale2x_uint32* restrict dst, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src0, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src1, const scale2x_uint32* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00458 {
00459  assert(count >= 2);
00460  
00461  /* first pixel */
00462  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00463   dst[0] = src1[0];
00464   dst[1] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00465  } else {
00466   dst[0] = src1[0];
00467   dst[1] = src1[0];
00468  }
00469  ++src0;
00470  ++src1;
00471  ++src2;
00472  dst += 2;
00473  
00474  /* central pixels */
00475  count -= 2;
00476  while (count) {
00477   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00478    dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00479    dst[1] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00480   } else {
00481    dst[0] = src1[0];
00482    dst[1] = src1[0];
00483   }
00484   
00485   ++src0;
00486   ++src1;
00487   ++src2;
00488   dst += 2;
00489   --count;
00490  }
00491  
00492  /* last pixel */
00493  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00494   dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00495   dst[1] = src1[0];
00496  } else {
00497   dst[0] = src1[0];
00498   dst[1] = src1[0];
00499  }
00500 }
00501 
00502 /**
00503  * Scale by a factor of 2 a row of pixels of 8 bits.
00504  * The function is implemented in C.
00505  * The pixels over the left and right borders are assumed of the same color of
00506  * the pixels on the border.
00507  * Note that the implementation is optimized to write data sequentially to
00508  * maximize the bandwidth on video memory.
00509  * \param src0 Pointer at the first pixel of the previous row.
00510  * \param src1 Pointer at the first pixel of the current row.
00511  * \param src2 Pointer at the first pixel of the next row.
00512  * \param count Length in pixels of the src0, src1 and src2 rows.
00513  * It must be at least 2.
00514  * \param dst0 First destination row, double length in pixels.
00515  * \param dst1 Second destination row, double length in pixels.
00516  */
00517 void scale2x_8_def(scale2x_uint8* dst0, scale2x_uint8* dst1, const scale2x_uint8* src0, const scale2x_uint8* src1, const scale2x_uint8* src2, unsigned count)
00518 {
00519 #ifdef USE_SCALE_RANDOMWRITE
00520  scale2x_8_def_whole(dst0, dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
00521 #else
00522  scale2x_8_def_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
00523  scale2x_8_def_border(dst1, src2, src1, src0, count);
00524 #endif
00525 }
00526 
00527 /**
00528  * Scale by a factor of 2 a row of pixels of 16 bits.
00529  * This function operates like scale2x_8_def() but for 16 bits pixels.
00530  * \param src0 Pointer at the first pixel of the previous row.
00531  * \param src1 Pointer at the first pixel of the current row.
00532  * \param src2 Pointer at the first pixel of the next row.
00533  * \param count Length in pixels of the src0, src1 and src2 rows.
00534  * It must be at least 2.
00535  * \param dst0 First destination row, double length in pixels.
00536  * \param dst1 Second destination row, double length in pixels.
00537  */
00538 void scale2x_16_def(scale2x_uint16* dst0, scale2x_uint16* dst1, const scale2x_uint16* src0, const scale2x_uint16* src1, const scale2x_uint16* src2, unsigned count)
00539 {
00540 #ifdef USE_SCALE_RANDOMWRITE
00541  scale2x_16_def_whole(dst0, dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
00542 #else
00543  scale2x_16_def_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
00544  scale2x_16_def_border(dst1, src2, src1, src0, count);
00545 #endif
00546 }
00547 
00548 /**
00549  * Scale by a factor of 2 a row of pixels of 32 bits.
00550  * This function operates like scale2x_8_def() but for 32 bits pixels.
00551  * \param src0 Pointer at the first pixel of the previous row.
00552  * \param src1 Pointer at the first pixel of the current row.
00553  * \param src2 Pointer at the first pixel of the next row.
00554  * \param count Length in pixels of the src0, src1 and src2 rows.
00555  * It must be at least 2.
00556  * \param dst0 First destination row, double length in pixels.
00557  * \param dst1 Second destination row, double length in pixels.
00558  */
00559 void scale2x_32_def(scale2x_uint32* dst0, scale2x_uint32* dst1, const scale2x_uint32* src0, const scale2x_uint32* src1, const scale2x_uint32* src2, unsigned count)
00560 {

00563 #else
00564  scale2x_32_def_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
00565  scale2x_32_def_border(dst1, src2, src1, src0, count);
00566 #endif
00567 }
00568

00572  */

00578 #else

00668 #endif
00669 }
00670 
00671 /***************************************************************************/
00672 /* Scale2x MMX implementation */
00673 
00674 #if defined(__GNUC__) && defined(__i386__)
00675 
00676 /*
00677  * Apply the Scale2x effect at a single row.
00678  * This function must be called only by the other scale2x functions.
00679  *
00680  * Considering the pixel map :
00681  *
00682  *      ABC (src0)
00683  *      DEF (src1)
00684  *      GHI (src2)
00685  *
00686  * this functions compute 2 new pixels in substitution of the source pixel E
00687  * like this map :
00688  *
00689  *      ab (dst)
00690  *
00691  * with these variables :
00692  *
00693  *      &current -> E
00694  *      &current_left -> D
00695  *      &current_right -> F
00696  *      &current_upper -> B
00697  *      &current_lower -> H
00698  *
00699  *      %0 -> current_upper
00700  *      %1 -> current
00701  *      %2 -> current_lower
00702  *      %3 -> dst
00703  *      %4 -> counter
00704  *
00705  *      %mm0 -> *current_left
00706  *      %mm1 -> *current_next
00707  *      %mm2 -> tmp0
00708  *      %mm3 -> tmp1
00709  *      %mm4 -> tmp2
00710  *      %mm5 -> tmp3
00711  *      %mm6 -> *current_upper
00712  *      %mm7 -> *current
00713  */
00714 static inline void scale2x_8_mmx_border(scale2x_uint8* dst, const scale2x_uint8* src0, const scale2x_uint8* src1, const scale2x_uint8* src2, unsigned count)
00715 {
00716  assert(count >= 16);
00717  assert(count % 8 == 0);
00718  
00719  /* always do the first and last run */
00720  count -= 2*8;
00721  
00722  __asm__ __volatile__(
00723  /* first run */
00724        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
00725        "movq 0(%1), %%mm0\n"
00726        "movq 0(%1), %%mm7\n"
00727        "movq 8(%1), %%mm1\n"
00728        "psllq $56, %%mm0\n"
00729        "psllq $56, %%mm1\n"
00730        "psrlq $56, %%mm0\n"
00731        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
00732        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00733        "psllq $8, %%mm2\n"
00734        "psrlq $8, %%mm3\n"
00735        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
00736        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
00737        
00738        /* current_upper */
00739        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
00740        
00741        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
00742        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
00743        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00744        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00745        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
00746        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
00747        "pcmpeqb %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
00748        "pcmpeqb %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
00749        "pcmpeqb (%2), %%mm3\n"
00750        "pcmpeqb (%2), %%mm5\n"
00751        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00752        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
00753        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00754        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00755        "pcmpeqb %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
00756        "pcmpeqb %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
00757        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
00758        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
00759        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00760        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
00761        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
00762        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
00763        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00764        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
00765        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
00766        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
00767        
00768        /* set *dst */
00769        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00770        "punpcklbw %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
00771        "punpckhbw %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
00772        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
00773        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
00774        
00775        /* next */
00776        "addl $8, %0\n"
00777        "addl $8, %1\n"
00778        "addl $8, %2\n"
00779        "addl $16, %3\n"
00780        
00781  /* central runs */
00782        "shrl $3, %4\n"
00783        "jz 1f\n"
00784        
00785        "0:\n"
00786        
00787        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
00788        "movq -8(%1), %%mm0\n"
00789        "movq (%1), %%mm7\n"
00790        "movq 8(%1), %%mm1\n"
00791        "psrlq $56, %%mm0\n"
00792        "psllq $56, %%mm1\n"
00793        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
00794        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00795        "psllq $8, %%mm2\n"
00796        "psrlq $8, %%mm3\n"
00797        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
00798        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
00799        
00800        /* current_upper */
00801        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
00802        
00803        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
00804        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
00805        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00806        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00807        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
00808        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
00809        "pcmpeqb %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
00810        "pcmpeqb %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
00811        "pcmpeqb (%2), %%mm3\n"
00812        "pcmpeqb (%2), %%mm5\n"
00813        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00814        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
00815        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00816        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00817        "pcmpeqb %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
00818        "pcmpeqb %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
00819        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
00820        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
00821        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00822        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
00823        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
00824        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
00825        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00826        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
00827        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
00828        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
00829        
00830        /* set *dst */
00831        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00832        "punpcklbw %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
00833        "punpckhbw %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
00834        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
00835        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
00836        
00837        /* next */
00838        "addl $8, %0\n"
00839        "addl $8, %1\n"
00840        "addl $8, %2\n"
00841        "addl $16, %3\n"
00842        
00843        "decl %4\n"
00844        "jnz 0b\n"
00845        "1:\n"
00846        
00847  /* final run */
00848        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
00849        "movq (%1), %%mm1\n"
00850        "movq (%1), %%mm7\n"
00851        "movq -8(%1), %%mm0\n"
00852        "psrlq $56, %%mm1\n"
00853        "psrlq $56, %%mm0\n"
00854        "psllq $56, %%mm1\n"
00855        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
00856        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00857        "psllq $8, %%mm2\n"
00858        "psrlq $8, %%mm3\n"
00859        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
00860        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
00861        
00862        /* current_upper */
00863        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
00864        
00865        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
00866        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
00867        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00868        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00869        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
00870        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
00871        "pcmpeqb %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
00872        "pcmpeqb %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
00873        "pcmpeqb (%2), %%mm3\n"
00874        "pcmpeqb (%2), %%mm5\n"
00875        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00876        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
00877        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00878        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00879        "pcmpeqb %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
00880        "pcmpeqb %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
00881        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
00882        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
00883        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00884        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
00885        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
00886        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
00887        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00888        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
00889        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
00890        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
00891        
00892        /* set *dst */
00893        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00894        "punpcklbw %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
00895        "punpckhbw %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
00896        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
00897        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
00898        
00899        : "+r" (src0), "+r" (src1), "+r" (src2), "+r" (dst), "+r" (count)
00900        :
00901        : "cc"
00902        );
00903 }
00904 
00905 static inline void scale2x_16_mmx_border(scale2x_uint16* dst, const scale2x_uint16* src0, const scale2x_uint16* src1, const scale2x_uint16* src2, unsigned count)
00906 {
00907  assert(count >= 8);
00908  assert(count % 4 == 0);
00909  
00910  /* always do the first and last run */
00911  count -= 2*4;
00912  
00913  __asm__ __volatile__(
00914  /* first run */
00915        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
00916        "movq 0(%1), %%mm0\n"
00917        "movq 0(%1), %%mm7\n"
00918        "movq 8(%1), %%mm1\n"
00919        "psllq $48, %%mm0\n"
00920        "psllq $48, %%mm1\n"
00921        "psrlq $48, %%mm0\n"
00922        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
00923        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00924        "psllq $16, %%mm2\n"
00925        "psrlq $16, %%mm3\n"
00926        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
00927        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
00928        
00929        /* current_upper */
00930        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
00931        
00932        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
00933        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
00934        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00935        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00936        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
00937        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
00938        "pcmpeqw %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
00939        "pcmpeqw %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
00940        "pcmpeqw (%2), %%mm3\n"
00941        "pcmpeqw (%2), %%mm5\n"
00942        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00943        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
00944        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00945        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00946        "pcmpeqw %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
00947        "pcmpeqw %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
00948        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
00949        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
00950        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00951        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
00952        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
00953        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
00954        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00955        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
00956        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
00957        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
00958        
00959        /* set *dst */
00960        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
00961        "punpcklwd %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
00962        "punpckhwd %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
00963        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
00964        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
00965        
00966        /* next */
00967        "addl $8, %0\n"
00968        "addl $8, %1\n"
00969        "addl $8, %2\n"
00970        "addl $16, %3\n"
00971        
00972  /* central runs */
00973        "shrl $2, %4\n"
00974        "jz 1f\n"
00975        
00976        "0:\n"
00977        
00978        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
00979        "movq -8(%1), %%mm0\n"
00980        "movq (%1), %%mm7\n"
00981        "movq 8(%1), %%mm1\n"
00982        "psrlq $48, %%mm0\n"
00983        "psllq $48, %%mm1\n"
00984        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
00985        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
00986        "psllq $16, %%mm2\n"
00987        "psrlq $16, %%mm3\n"
00988        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
00989        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
00990        
00991        /* current_upper */
00992        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
00993        
00994        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
00995        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
00996        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
00997        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
00998        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
00999        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
01000        "pcmpeqw %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01001        "pcmpeqw %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01002        "pcmpeqw (%2), %%mm3\n"
01003        "pcmpeqw (%2), %%mm5\n"
01004        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01005        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01006        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01007        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01008        "pcmpeqw %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
01009        "pcmpeqw %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
01010        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01011        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01012        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01013        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01014        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01015        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01016        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01017        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
01018        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01019        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01020        
01021        /* set *dst */
01022        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01023        "punpcklwd %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
01024        "punpckhwd %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
01025        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
01026        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
01027        
01028        /* next */
01029        "addl $8, %0\n"
01030        "addl $8, %1\n"
01031        "addl $8, %2\n"
01032        "addl $16, %3\n"
01033        
01034        "decl %4\n"
01035        "jnz 0b\n"
01036        "1:\n"
01037        
01038  /* final run */
01039        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
01040        "movq (%1), %%mm1\n"
01041        "movq (%1), %%mm7\n"
01042        "movq -8(%1), %%mm0\n"
01043        "psrlq $48, %%mm1\n"
01044        "psrlq $48, %%mm0\n"
01045        "psllq $48, %%mm1\n"
01046        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
01047        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01048        "psllq $16, %%mm2\n"
01049        "psrlq $16, %%mm3\n"
01050        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
01051        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
01052        
01053        /* current_upper */
01054        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
01055        
01056        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
01057        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
01058        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01059        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01060        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
01061        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
01062        "pcmpeqw %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01063        "pcmpeqw %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01064        "pcmpeqw (%2), %%mm3\n"
01065        "pcmpeqw (%2), %%mm5\n"
01066        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01067        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01068        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01069        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01070        "pcmpeqw %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
01071        "pcmpeqw %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
01072        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01073        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01074        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01075        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01076        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01077        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01078        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01079        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
01080        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01081        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01082        
01083        /* set *dst */
01084        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01085        "punpcklwd %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
01086        "punpckhwd %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
01087        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
01088        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
01089        
01090        : "+r" (src0), "+r" (src1), "+r" (src2), "+r" (dst), "+r" (count)
01091        :
01092        : "cc"
01093        );
01094 }
01095 
01096 static inline void scale2x_32_mmx_border(scale2x_uint32* dst, const scale2x_uint32* src0, const scale2x_uint32* src1, const scale2x_uint32* src2, unsigned count)
01097 {
01098  assert(count >= 4);
01099  assert(count % 2 == 0);
01100  
01101  /* always do the first and last run */
01102  count -= 2*2;
01103  
01104  __asm__ __volatile__(
01105  /* first run */
01106        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
01107        "movq 0(%1), %%mm0\n"
01108        "movq 0(%1), %%mm7\n"
01109        "movq 8(%1), %%mm1\n"
01110        "psllq $32, %%mm0\n"
01111        "psllq $32, %%mm1\n"
01112        "psrlq $32, %%mm0\n"
01113        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
01114        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01115        "psllq $32, %%mm2\n"
01116        "psrlq $32, %%mm3\n"
01117        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
01118        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
01119        
01120        /* current_upper */
01121        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
01122        
01123        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
01124        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
01125        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01126        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01127        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
01128        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
01129        "pcmpeqd %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01130        "pcmpeqd %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01131        "pcmpeqd (%2), %%mm3\n"
01132        "pcmpeqd (%2), %%mm5\n"
01133        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01134        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01135        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01136        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01137        "pcmpeqd %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
01138        "pcmpeqd %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
01139        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01140        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01141        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01142        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01143        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01144        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01145        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01146        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
01147        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01148        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01149        
01150        /* set *dst */
01151        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01152        "punpckldq %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
01153        "punpckhdq %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
01154        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
01155        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
01156        
01157        /* next */
01158        "addl $8, %0\n"
01159        "addl $8, %1\n"
01160        "addl $8, %2\n"
01161        "addl $16, %3\n"
01162        
01163  /* central runs */
01164        "shrl $1, %4\n"
01165        "jz 1f\n"
01166        
01167        "0:\n"
01168        
01169        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
01170        "movq -8(%1), %%mm0\n"
01171        "movq (%1), %%mm7\n"
01172        "movq 8(%1), %%mm1\n"
01173        "psrlq $32, %%mm0\n"
01174        "psllq $32, %%mm1\n"
01175        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
01176        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01177        "psllq $32, %%mm2\n"
01178        "psrlq $32, %%mm3\n"
01179        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
01180        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
01181        
01182        /* current_upper */
01183        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
01184        
01185        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
01186        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
01187        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01188        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01189        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
01190        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
01191        "pcmpeqd %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01192        "pcmpeqd %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01193        "pcmpeqd (%2), %%mm3\n"
01194        "pcmpeqd (%2), %%mm5\n"
01195        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01196        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01197        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01198        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01199        "pcmpeqd %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
01200        "pcmpeqd %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
01201        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01202        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01203        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01204        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01205        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01206        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01207        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01208        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
01209        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01210        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01211        
01212        /* set *dst */
01213        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01214        "punpckldq %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
01215        "punpckhdq %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
01216        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
01217        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
01218        
01219        /* next */
01220        "addl $8, %0\n"
01221        "addl $8, %1\n"
01222        "addl $8, %2\n"
01223        "addl $16, %3\n"
01224        
01225        "decl %4\n"
01226        "jnz 0b\n"
01227        "1:\n"
01228        
01229  /* final run */
01230        /* set the current, current_pre, current_next registers */
01231        "movq (%1), %%mm1\n"
01232        "movq (%1), %%mm7\n"
01233        "movq -8(%1), %%mm0\n"
01234        "psrlq $32, %%mm1\n"
01235        "psrlq $32, %%mm0\n"
01236        "psllq $32, %%mm1\n"
01237        "movq %%mm7, %%mm2\n"
01238        "movq %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01239        "psllq $32, %%mm2\n"
01240        "psrlq $32, %%mm3\n"
01241        "por %%mm2, %%mm0\n"
01242        "por %%mm3, %%mm1\n"
01243        
01244        /* current_upper */
01245        "movq (%0), %%mm6\n"
01246        
01247        /* compute the upper-left pixel for dst on %%mm2 */
01248        /* compute the upper-right pixel for dst on %%mm4 */
01249        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01250        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01251        "movq %%mm0, %%mm3\n"
01252        "movq %%mm1, %%mm5\n"
01253        "pcmpeqd %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01254        "pcmpeqd %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01255        "pcmpeqd (%2), %%mm3\n"
01256        "pcmpeqd (%2), %%mm5\n"
01257        "pandn %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01258        "pandn %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01259        "movq %%mm0, %%mm2\n"
01260        "movq %%mm1, %%mm4\n"
01261        "pcmpeqd %%mm1, %%mm2\n"
01262        "pcmpeqd %%mm0, %%mm4\n"
01263        "pandn %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01264        "pandn %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01265        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01266        "movq %%mm4, %%mm5\n"
01267        "pand %%mm6, %%mm2\n"
01268        "pand %%mm6, %%mm4\n"
01269        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm3\n"
01270        "pandn %%mm7, %%mm5\n"
01271        "por %%mm3, %%mm2\n"
01272        "por %%mm5, %%mm4\n"
01273        
01274        /* set *dst */
01275        "movq %%mm2, %%mm3\n"
01276        "punpckldq %%mm4, %%mm2\n"
01277        "punpckhdq %%mm4, %%mm3\n"
01278        "movq %%mm2, (%3)\n"
01279        "movq %%mm3, 8(%3)\n"
01280        
01281        : "+r" (src0), "+r" (src1), "+r" (src2), "+r" (dst), "+r" (count)
01282        :
01283        : "cc"
01284        );
01285 }
01286 
01287 /**
01288  * Scale by a factor of 2 a row of pixels of 8 bits.
01289  * This is a very fast MMX implementation.
01290  * The implementation uses a combination of cmp/and/not operations to
01291  * completly remove the need of conditional jumps. This trick give the
01292  * major speed improvement.
01293  * Also, using the 8 bytes MMX registers more than one pixel are computed
01294  * at the same time.
01295  * Before calling this function you must ensure that the currenct CPU supports
01296  * the MMX instruction set. After calling it you must be sure to call the EMMS
01297  * instruction before any floating-point operation.
01298  * The pixels over the left and right borders are assumed of the same color of
01299  * the pixels on the border.
01300  * Note that the implementation is optimized to write data sequentially to
01301  * maximize the bandwidth on video memory.
01302  * \param src0 Pointer at the first pixel of the previous row.
01303  * \param src1 Pointer at the first pixel of the current row.
01304  * \param src2 Pointer at the first pixel of the next row.
01305  * \param count Length in pixels of the src0, src1 and src2 rows. It must
01306  * be at least 16 and a multiple of 8.
01307  * \param dst0 First destination row, double length in pixels.
01308  * \param dst1 Second destination row, double length in pixels.
01309  */
01310 void scale2x_8_mmx(scale2x_uint8* dst0, scale2x_uint8* dst1, const scale2x_uint8* src0, const scale2x_uint8* src1, const scale2x_uint8* src2, unsigned count)
01311 {
01312  if (count % 8 != 0 || count < 16) {
01313   scale2x_8_def(dst0, dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
01314  } else {
01315   scale2x_8_mmx_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
01316   scale2x_8_mmx_border(dst1, src2, src1, src0, count);
01317  }
01318 }
01319 
01320 /**
01321  * Scale by a factor of 2 a row of pixels of 16 bits.
01322  * This function operates like scale2x_8_mmx() but for 16 bits pixels.
01323  * \param src0 Pointer at the first pixel of the previous row.
01324  * \param src1 Pointer at the first pixel of the current row.
01325  * \param src2 Pointer at the first pixel of the next row.
01326  * \param count Length in pixels of the src0, src1 and src2 rows. It must
01327  * be at least 8 and a multiple of 4.
01328  * \param dst0 First destination row, double length in pixels.
01329  * \param dst1 Second destination row, double length in pixels.
01330  */
01331 void scale2x_16_mmx(scale2x_uint16* dst0, scale2x_uint16* dst1, const scale2x_uint16* src0, const scale2x_uint16* src1, const scale2x_uint16* src2, unsigned count)
01332 {
01333  if (count % 4 != 0 || count < 8) {
01334   scale2x_16_def(dst0, dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
01335  } else {
01336   scale2x_16_mmx_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
01337   scale2x_16_mmx_border(dst1, src2, src1, src0, count);
01338  }
01339 }
01340 
01341 /**
01342  * Scale by a factor of 2 a row of pixels of 32 bits.
01343  * This function operates like scale2x_8_mmx() but for 32 bits pixels.
01344  * \param src0 Pointer at the first pixel of the previous row.
01345  * \param src1 Pointer at the first pixel of the current row.
01346  * \param src2 Pointer at the first pixel of the next row.
01347  * \param count Length in pixels of the src0, src1 and src2 rows. It must
01348  * be at least 4 and a multiple of 2.
01349  * \param dst0 First destination row, double length in pixels.
01350  * \param dst1 Second destination row, double length in pixels.
01351  */
01352 void scale2x_32_mmx(scale2x_uint32* dst0, scale2x_uint32* dst1, const scale2x_uint32* src0, const scale2x_uint32* src1, const scale2x_uint32* src2, unsigned count)
01353 {
01354  if (count % 2 != 0 || count < 4) {
01355   scale2x_32_def(dst0, dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
01356  } else {
01357   scale2x_32_mmx_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
01358   scale2x_32_mmx_border(dst1, src2, src1, src0, count);
01359  }
01360 }
01361 
01362 /**
01363  * Scale by a factor of 2x3 a row of pixels of 8 bits.
01364  * This function operates like scale2x_8_mmx() but with an expansion
01365  * factor of 2x3 instead of 2x2.
01366  */
01367 void scale2x3_8_mmx(scale2x_uint8* dst0, scale2x_uint8* dst1, scale2x_uint8* dst2, const scale2x_uint8* src0, const scale2x_uint8* src1, const scale2x_uint8* src2, unsigned count)
01368 {
01369  if (count % 8 != 0 || count < 16) {
01370   scale2x3_8_def(dst0, dst1, dst2, src0, src1, src2, count);
01371  } else {
01372   scale2x_8_mmx_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
01373   scale2x_8_def_center(dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
01374   scale2x_8_mmx_border(dst2, src2, src1, src0, count);
01375  }
01376 }

01415 void scale2x4_8_mmx(scale2x_uint8* dst0, scale2x_uint8* dst1, scale2x_uint8* dst2, scale2x_uint8* dst3, const scale2x_uint8* src0, const scale2x_uint8* src1, const scale2x_uint8* src2, unsigned count)
01416 {

01418   scale2x4_8_def(dst0, dst1, dst2, dst3, src0, src1, src2, count);

01423   scale2x_8_mmx_border(dst3, src2, src1, src0, count);
01424  }
01425 }

01427 /**
01428  * Scale by a factor of 2x4 a row of pixels of 16 bits.
01429  * This function operates like scale2x_16_mmx() but with an expansion
01430  * factor of 2x4 instead of 2x2.
01431  */
01432 void scale2x4_16_mmx(scale2x_uint16* dst0, scale2x_uint16* dst1, scale2x_uint16* dst2, scale2x_uint16* dst3, const scale2x_uint16* src0, const scale2x_uint16* src1, const scale2x_uint16* src2, unsigned count)
01433 {

01435   scale2x4_16_def(dst0, dst1, dst2, dst3, src0, src1, src2, count);
01436  } else {

01438   scale2x_16_def_center(dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
01439   scale2x_16_def_center(dst2, src0, src1, src2, count);
01440   scale2x_16_mmx_border(dst3, src2, src1, src0, count);
01441  }
01442 }
01443 
01444 /**
01445  * Scale by a factor of 2x4 a row of pixels of 32 bits.
01446  * This function operates like scale2x_32_mmx() but with an expansion
01447  * factor of 2x4 instead of 2x2.
01448  */
01449 void scale2x4_32_mmx(scale2x_uint32* dst0, scale2x_uint32* dst1, scale2x_uint32* dst2, scale2x_uint32* dst3, const scale2x_uint32* src0, const scale2x_uint32* src1, const scale2x_uint32* src2, unsigned count)
01450 {
01451  if (count % 2 != 0 || count < 4) {
01452   scale2x4_32_def(dst0, dst1, dst2, dst3, src0, src1, src2, count);
01453  } else {
01454   scale2x_32_mmx_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
01455   scale2x_32_def_center(dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
01456   scale2x_32_def_center(dst2, src0, src1, src2, count);
